game.title: The Missing Scholar
game.objective: Find the missing scholar, Professor Aldous, in the Ruins of Oldoria.
game.description: Professor Aldous, a renowned scholar from the University of Arcania, has gone missing while conducting research in the Ruins of Oldoria. Players must venture into the ruins, uncover clues, and face treacherous challenges to find the missing professor.

task.objective: Seek information at the Sacred Library.
